attributes.action: Maintain the standard of broadcasting on UK Radio by insisting that Radio Five Live keeps Luke Harvey as racing correspondent.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current drive to cut costs within the BBC has resulted in the laying off of an institution.  Throughout the country there is a avid band of radio listeners who regularly tune into to listen to the racing correspondent Luke Harvey.  In an age where role models are needed and a nation needs to be encouraged to participate in sport, the removal of a modern day icon associated with sport is a retrograde step.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
